name: Dinosaur Memory Games for Kids
description:
Meet our new Dinosaurs Memory Game for kids for all ages! Dinomania is classical brain training game with tons of fun dinos of many different arts! Clear and simple user interface will help kids to improve their memory, better develop their concentration ability and cognitive skills. The difficulty of the game can be flexible adjusted from 6 to 30 board cards according to the kids age and personal wishes.

Game objectives:
- Find all card pairs by turning them one after another. If 2 turned cards are not matching they will be turned back and you need to repeat your search. Try to find all matches as soon as possible and with less possible tries to get the higher score.

Game features:
- Simple and easy to use interface design for kids
- Flexible difficulty setup for 6, 12, 20, 24 and 30 board cards
- Over 80 fun Dinosaurs cards to play with
- High-score tracking in the Game Center
- Universal app design for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch

Major benefits:
- Fun and useful preschool activity for kids of all ages
- Visual memory training
- Concentrating and congestion abilities improvement
- Cognitive skills development

Download this app now and enjoy it with your kids for very long time!
